text: Hallothamus decorus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Hallothamus. It was described by Thomson in 1868.Biolib.cz - Hallothamus decorus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1868 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Hallothamus
